description: Tests inject_from - snowball mode with additional context injected from earlier phases

phases.name: original_design
phases.instructions: Create an original design for a logo. Describe it in detail with colors and shapes. Include the codeword ORIGINAL-V1 in your response. Then route to feedback.

phases.name: feedback
phases.instructions: Review the design and provide constructive feedback. Include the codeword FEEDBACK-F1 in your response. Then route to revision.

phases.name: revision
phases.instructions: Based on the feedback, create a revised version of the logo. Include the codeword REVISION-R1 in your response. Then route to compare.

phases.name: compare
phases.instructions:
You are in the compare phase. You should see:
1. The snowball context (feedback + revision from recent phases)
2. PLUS the original design from phase 1 (injected)

Compare the original design (ORIGINAL-V1) with the revised version (REVISION-R1).

IMPORTANT: You should see BOTH codewords ORIGINAL-V1 and REVISION-R1. If you only see one, the inject_from is not working correctly.
